pr_title: DHFPROD-5126: Support XML instances in search transform

timeline.bodyText:
How is this returning an array? http://docs.marklogic.com/es.instanceJsonFromDocument says it should return an objectNode. The name "getEntityInstance" also implies that a single thing is being returned, not an array.
Perhaps you just need to call fn.head on the result of es.instanceJsonFromDocument, as shown in the docs page for that function?
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.bodyText: I'm hoping this code won't be necessary if you call fn.head on the result from es.instanceJsonFromDocument.
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.bodyText: These looks like good tests, but hoping that getEntityInstance can be adjusted above to either return a single object or nothing, not an array.
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.message:
DHFPROD-5126: Support XML instances in search results transform
DHFPROD-5276: Change manageSavedQuery privilege to savedQueryUser
